department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 隨著跨領域科技的進步，醫學領域新科技迅速發展，包括高精準度快速疾病檢測晶片、行動醫療裝置、人工智慧醫學診斷、及個體化基因檢測等新科技, 使人類對疾病診斷、治療及致病機轉更充分瞭解與精準化。醫學相關領域學生實有必要了解傳統與當代醫學技術與應用原理。本課程目的主以傳授醫學技術學理與臨床應用知識，增進學生對疾病發生的原因，診斷，疾病進程等病理變化以及技術應用原理的理解,並啟發對當代跨領域醫療技術及未來精準化醫學發展的思維與實踐。
goal.en: With the evolution of interdisciplinary biotechnologies, novel biomedical tools are rapidly emerging, such as rapid disease detection chips, mobile medical devices, artificial intelligence diagnosis, and personalized gene sequencing. These advancements enable a deeper comprehension of disease diagnosis, pathogenesis, progression, and treatment. It‘s imperative for students in medical fields to grasp the principles and applications of both conventional and cutting-edge medical technologies. This course aims to furnish students with comprehensive knowledge of medical technologies, fostering critical thinking and exploring potential applications in contemporary interdisciplinary medical technology and the advancement of precision medicine.

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
